notes:
http://www.rallye-info.com/event_results.asp?event=288

An oldie but a goodie from AUTOart. The brush guard and snorkel really look the part and the small lights (?) in the rearview mirrors are easy to overlook but a nice detail. While the snorkel is flexible I don't know how much flexing it can take so I didn't try to pry the bonnet open to take photos of the engine. It's on par with other AUTOart releases of the time.

1999 was the last year that Totoya produced any WRC Corollas (15 total) and Sainz drove this one to a 3rd place finish in the rally.
